"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"2"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"2"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"2"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"They began to accuse him, saying, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"blue","recipient":"Pontius Pilate","source":"Jewish Leaders","time_period":["0s AD"],"unique_recipients":["Pontius Pilate"],"unique_sources":["Jewish Leaders"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"2"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“We found this man perverting the nation, forbidding paying taxes to Caesar, and saying that he himself is Christ, a king.” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"3"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"3"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"3"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Pilate asked him, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"blue","recipient":"Jesus","source":"Pontius Pilate","time_period":["0s AD"],"unique_recipients":["Jesus"],"unique_sources":["Pontius you the King of the Jews?” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"3"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"He answered him, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"Pontius Pilate","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["Pontius Pilate"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"3"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“So you say.” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"4"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"4"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"4"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Pilate said to the chief priests and the multitudes, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"blue","recipient":"Jewish Leaders & The Crowd","source":"Pontius Pilate","time_period":["0s AD"],"unique_recipients":["Jewish Leaders","The Crowd"],"unique_sources":["Pontius Pilate"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"4"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“I find no basis for a charge against this man.” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"5"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"5"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"5"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"But they insisted, saying, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"blue","recipient":"Pontius Pilate","source":"The Crowd","time_period":["0s AD"],"unique_recipients":["Pontius Pilate"],"unique_sources":["The Crowd"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"5"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“He stirs up the people, teaching throughout all Judea, beginning from Galilee even to this place.” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"6"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"6"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"6"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"But when Pilate heard Galilee mentioned, he asked if the man was a Galilean. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"7"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"7"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"7"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"When he found out that he was in Herod’s jurisdiction, he sent him to Herod, who was also in Jerusalem during those days. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"8"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"8"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"8"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Now when Herod saw Jesus, he was exceedingly glad, for he had wanted to see him for a long time, because he had heard many things about him. He hoped to see some miracle done by him. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"9"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"9"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"9"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"He questioned him with many words, but he gave no answers. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"10"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"10"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"10"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"The chief priests and the scribes stood, vehemently accusing him. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"11"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"11"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"11"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Herod with his soldiers humiliated him and mocked him. Dressing him in luxurious clothing, they sent him back to Pilate. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"12"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"12"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"12"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Herod and Pilate became friends with each other that very day, for before that they were enemies with each other. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"13"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"13"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"13"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Pilate called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people, "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"14"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"14"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"14"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"and said to them, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"blue","recipient":"Jewish Leaders & The Crowd","source":"Pontius Pilate","time_period":["0s AD"],"unique_recipients":["Jewish Leaders","The Crowd"],"unique_sources":["Pontius Pilate"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"14"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“You brought this man to me as one that perverts the people, and see, I have examined him before you, and found no basis for a charge against this man concerning those things of which you accuse him. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"15"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"15"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"15"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Neither has Herod, for I sent you to him, and see, nothing worthy of death has been done by him. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"16"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"16"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"16"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"I will therefore chastise him and release him.” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"17"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"17"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"17"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Now he had to release one prisoner to them at the feast. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"18"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"18"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"18"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"But they all cried out together, saying, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"blue","recipient":"Pontius Pilate","source":"The Crowd","time_period":["0s AD"],"unique_recipients":["Pontius Pilate"],"unique_sources":["The Crowd"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"18"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“Away with this man! Release to us Barabbas!”— "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"19"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"19"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"19"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"one who was thrown into prison for a certain revolt in the city, and for murder. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"20"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"20"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"20"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Then Pilate spoke to them again, wanting to release Jesus, "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"21"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"21"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"21"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"but they shouted, saying, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"blue","recipient":"Pontius Pilate","source":"The Crowd","time_period":["0s AD"],"unique_recipients":["Pontius Pilate"],"unique_sources":["The Crowd"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"21"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“Crucify! Crucify him!” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"22"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"22"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"22"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"He said to them the third time, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"blue","recipient":"The Crowd","source":"Pontius Pilate","time_period":["0s AD"],"unique_recipients":["The Crowd"],"unique_sources":["Pontius Pilate"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"22"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“Why? What evil has this man done? I have found no capital crime in him. I will therefore chastise him and release him.” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"23"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"23"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"23"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"But they were urgent with loud voices, asking that he might be crucified. Their voices and the voices of the chief priests prevailed. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"24"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"24"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"24"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Pilate decreed that what they asked for should be done. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"25"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"25"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"25"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"He released him who had been thrown into prison for insurrection and murder, for whom they asked, but he delivered Jesus up to their will. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"26"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"26"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"26"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"When they led him away, they grabbed one Simon of Cyrene, coming from the country, and laid on him the cross, to carry it after Jesus. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"27"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"27"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"27"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"A great multitude of the people followed him, including women who also mourned and lamented him. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"28"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"28"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"28"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"But Jesus, turning to them, said, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"Daughters of Jerusalem","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["Daughters of Jerusalem"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"28"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“Daughters of Jerusalem, don’t weep for me, but weep for yourselves and for your children. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"29"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"29"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"29"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"For behold, the days are coming in which they will say, ‘Blessed are the barren, the wombs that never bore, and the breasts that never nursed.’ "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"30"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"30"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"30"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Then they will begin to tell the mountains, ‘Fall on us!’ and tell the hills, ‘Cover us.’ "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"31"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"31"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"31"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"For if they do these things in the green tree, what will be done in the dry?” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"32"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"32"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"32"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"There were also others, two criminals, led with him to be put to death. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"33"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"33"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"23","verse":"33"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"When they came to the place that is called The Skull, they crucified him there with the criminals, one on the right and the other on the left.
